trans-unit.target: Пусть Edgeworld узнает, что ты думаешь!

Dear Commander: We’d like to get your feedback on how Edgeworld can serve you better. Your comments and suggestions are very important to us, so we’d love to hear from you! We will take your input very seriously, so please take a few minutes to fill out our customer feedback survey. Click here to take the survey now! Thank you! The Edgeworld Team
